programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A wheaten terrier mix is so attached to her owner that she won't leave his side; a shar-pei who is aggressive towards other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An English Bulldog who is destroying her owner's house and aggressive towards their other dog; Howie Mandel's chihuahua is aggressive towards him and his wife.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A border collie/greyhound mix with an aversion to other dogs; a woman tries to tame her dog's nervousness; a large dog with too much energy.

programme.desc: Cesar helps Casey Anderson, of "Expedition Wild," and his wife, actress Missi Pyle, with their dogs; a pit bull's fears make him aggressive.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps an overly aggressive German shepherd and a timid rat terrier.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help bring peace to Jennifer Lee Pryor's home, where fights have been breaking out among foster dogs and her own four dogs; an aggressive beagle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.desc: A Lab-greyhound mix has aggression problems; a Rhodesian Ridgeback-boxer mix has severe dog aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier barks too much; a once-shy German shepherd becomes aggressive; a shepherd mix has a whining problem.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help an aggressive Shiba Inu from Japan and meets a wire fox terrier who has a fixation with a riding lawn-mower.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar revisits some of his toughest cases and sees how being on the show changed not only the dogs, but the lives of the owners.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Alaskan malamute exhibits aggressive tendencies; Cesar helps a professional dog walker with her clients.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A German shepherd and Welsh corgi mix has dog aggression; a blind Lab chases his tail when he is around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive bulldog; a beagle/terrier mix with a fear of trash cans; a Lab mix who starts to exhibit anxiety outside.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward strangers; a Rottweiler/Shar-Pei mix must get his aggression under control or be euthanized.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback/boxer mix's high energy develops into severe aggression; a couple's whippets bark and lunge at any dog that comes inside the boutique.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A mail carrier learns to thwart dog attacks; two Pomeranians attack each other when left alone; a Swiss mountain dog is aggressive around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A miniature schnauzer compulsively spins in circles; four French bulldogs do not listen to their owner; a mixed breed has a leash tied so tightly it has to be surgically removed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Milan is called in to help singer Patti LaBelle who is afraid of her own guard dog and a teacher who wants to unify her dog's dual personalities.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback mix has eccentricities; a Jack Russell terrier attacks motorcycles; a border collie's herding instincts get the best of him.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is too dedicated to its owner; a beagle mix lashes out at anyone who walks past; an Italian mastiff fears cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A puppy terrorizes its owner's cat; a spoiled Yorkshire terrier; a Rottweiler is aggressive toward strangers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Italian greyhound mix is possessive over bones and toys; a mastiff misbehaves outside; a Yorkshire terrier takes over her owner's morning routine.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An unpredictably aggressive Kerry blue terrier; two territorial Maltese dogs who are close to being banned from the retirement home where they live; a bloodhound/Catahoula mix who attacks her canine companion.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar visits Tijuana, Mexico, to team up with volunteers from United Hope for Animals, an organization that rescues dogs and finds them U.S. homes; a cocker spaniel taunts her owner.
